sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>When state is On-Hold > Awaiting Vendor A new field appear to select a vendor and only selected vendors appear - based on the caller comapny</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 01:00:00</actual_hours> <approval>approved</approval> <assigned_to display_value="Rachel Rowlandson">45ccd59e4f2863007e72aa95d310c767</assigned_to> <assignment_group display_value="GB3" name="GB3">242324124fa463007e72aa95d310c748</assignment_group> <category display_value="Incident">c99d05924f2863007e72aa95d310c7b0</category> <company display_value="GB3">b771e09e4f6463007e72aa95d310c784</company> <description>When selecting Awaiting vendor, the user will have to insert the vendor it's pending to. The list of avaialble vendors is based on the vendors that are realting to the caller.company</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 01:00:00</estimated_hours> <estimated_hours_sp/> <notes/> <number>TAS0001070</number> <package display_value="PACK0001015">ad90a6b24f60e3007e72aa95d310c7c7</package> <short_description>State on-hold - Awaiting Vendor - vendor</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>testing</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-09-19 20:40:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>f98b2c1b4f6027007e72aa95d310c7c0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>chris.murphy@gb3.co.uk</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-09-28 13:51:04</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name/> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
